purpose: Enable developers to submit and manage MCP servers for inclusion in Cline's MCP Marketplace, facilitating discoverability and installation by developers.
principle: Operates as a submission and management platform for MCP servers, integrating with Cline's ecosystem for server discovery and installation.
reusability: Provides a structured process for server submission to be listed in the marketplace, potentially supporting API-based submissions in the future.
limitations: Currently limited to MCP server submissions; requires adherence to submission guidelines and approval process.
name: mcp-marketplace
description: This is the official repository for submitting MCP servers to be included in Cline's MCP Marketplace. If youâ€™ve built an MCP server and want it to be discoverable and easily installable by millions of developers using Cline, submit your server here.
highlight: Official repository for submitting and managing MCP servers in Cline's marketplace ecosystem.
